thread.title: Fabulous Hotel In the Heart of Manhattan
thread.title_full: Fabulous Hotel In the Heart of Manhattan - Review of Four Seasons Hotel New York, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: kaisermugs
title: Fabulous Hotel In the Heart of Manhattan
text: Wonderful hotel. I always stay at Four Seasons on worldwide travel. My only surprise was to find that there was no coffee maker or complimentary bottled water available in our room. This is the first Four Seasons I have ever stayed at that had neither. I had to order two bottles of water and ice from room service and it was $60. Come on....
